name: Luke's Ultimatum
Lore: '''Jabba! This is your last chance. Free us or die.''',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Once per turn, during battle at a Jabba''s Palace site, may say ''Free us or die!'' to make your destiny draws +1 and your Interrupts immune to Sense for remainder of battle. May place this Effect out of play to cause a player to activate 2 Force.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
